products.title: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room.  Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  Splash Snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. 
   
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1578 Fabric Colour: Snow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
